aebracket: 3,5,7 frame, in 1/3, 2/3 or 1 EV Step, +/-3 EV
exposuremode: Program AE, Aperture Priority AE, Shutter Priority AE, Manual, Auto
flashmode: Auto, Auto/Red-eye Reduction, Forced On, Forced On/Red-eye Reduction, / Slow Sync., Slow Sync./Red-eye Reduction, Forced Off
lensname: LUMIX G X VARIO PZ 14-42mm/F3.5-5.6 ASPH/POWER
playbackmode: Normal playback, 30-thumbnail display, 12-thumbnail display, Calendar display, Zoomed playback (16x Max.), Slideshow (duration & effect is selectable), Playback Mode (Normal/Picture/Video/3D Play/Category/Favorite), / Title Edit, Text Stamp, Video Divide, Resize, Cropping, Aspect Conversion, Rotate, Rotate Display, Favorite, Print set, Protect, Face Recognition Edit
whitebalancebracket: 3 exposures in blue/ amber axis or in magenta/ green axis
numberofrecordableimages: 9 images (when there are RAW files with the particular speed) / Unlimited consecutive shooting (when there are no RAW files) / (depending on memory card size, battery power, picture size, and compression)
afmode: Face detection / AF Tracking / 23-area-focusing / 1-area-focusing/Pinpoint / Touch (1- area-focusing in Face detection / AF Tracking / Multi-area-focusing / 1-area-focusing / Pinpoint)
stillimage: SCN mode Portrait / Soft Skin / Scenery / Architecture / Sports / Peripheral Defocus / Flower / Food / Objects / Night Portrait / Night Scenery / Illiminatioms / Baby 1, 2 / Pet / Party / Sunset
microphone: Stereo, Wind-cut: Off / Auto / Microphone level adjustable: Lv1 / Lv2 / Lv3 / Lv4
monitoradjustment: Brightness (7 levels), Contrast and Saturation (7 levels), Red tint (7 levels), Blue tint (7 levels)
dimensions: (W x H x D) 116.3 x 67.8 x 39.4 mm / 4.58 x 2.67 x 1.55 inch　(excluding protrusions)
movie: SCN mode Portrait / Soft Skin / Scenery / Architecture / Sports / Flower / Food / Objects / Low-light / Party / Sunset / (Activated by selecting Still Image SCN mode then pressing Movie Button. Still Image SCN modes without corresponding Movie SCN mode is recorded in mode suitable for the recording situation.)
weightapprox: 318g / 11.22 oz （SD card, Battery, Body) / Approx. 272g / 9.59 oz （Body only) / Approx. 413g / 14.59 oz (SD card, Battery, H-PS14042 lens included)
speaker: Monaural
creativecontrol: (Still image & Motion image) Expressive / Retro / High key / Low key / Sepia / High Dyamic / Toy effect / Miniature effect
audiovideooutput: Monaural Type, NTSC/PAL, NTSC only for North America / *Check the website of the Panasonic sales company in your country or region for details on the products that are available in your market.
aelock: Set the Fn button in custom menu to AE lock
isosensitivity: (Standard Output Sensitivity) Auto / Intelligent ISO / 160 / 200 / 400 / 800 / 1600 / 3200 / 6400 / 12800 (Changeable to 1/3 EV step)
aflock: Set the Fn button in custom menu to AF/AE lock or Shutter button halfway pressed in AFS mode
lensconstruction: 9 elements in 8 groups (4 aspherical lenses , 2 ED lens)
hdmi: miniHDMI TypeC / Video: Auto / 1080i / 720p / 480p (576p in PAL system) / Audio: Linear PCM
hotshoe: TTL Auto with FL220 / FL360 / FL500 (Optional)
protection: Single / Multi, Single in Burst Group / Multi in Burst Group, Cancel
standardaccessories: Battery Charger, Body Cap, Lens Cap, Lens Rear Cap / USB Connection Cable, Shoulder Strap, CD-ROM
others: Electric zoom lever, Manual focus lever
extrateleconversion: Motion image: Max.4.8x (Magnification ratio depends on the recording quality and aspect ratio.)
functionbutton: Fn1, Fn2, Fn3*, Fn4*(*Touch icons on LCD monitor) ONE PUSH AE /PREVIEW / LEVEL GAUGE / FOCUS AREA SET / PHOTO STYLE / ASPECT RATIO / PICTURE SIZE / QUALITY / METERING MODE / FLASH / FLASH ADJUST. / I.RESOLUTION / I.DYNAMIC / EX. TELE CONV. /
directprint: PictBridge compatible（Print size, Layout, Date setting are selectable ）
shutterspeed: Still Images: 1/4000 ~ 60 and Bulb (up to approx. 2 minutes) / Motion image: 1/16000 ~ 1/30 (NTSC), 1/16000 ~ 1/25 (PAL)
burstspeed: SH: 20 frames/sec, H: 4.2 frames/sec (When AFS mode), M: 3 frames/sec (with Live View), L: 2 frames/sec (with Live View)
remotecontrol: Remote control with bulb function by DMW-RSL1 (Optional)
imagequality: RAW, RAW+Fine, RAW+Standard, Fine, Standard, / MPO+Fine, MPO+Standard (with 3D lens in Micro Four Thirds System standard)
recordingmedia: SD memory card, SDHC memory card, SDXC memory card (Compatible with UHS-I standard SDHC/SDXC memory cards)
whitebalance: Auto / Daylight / Cloudy / Shade / Incandescent / Flash / White Set 1, 2 / Color temperature setting
recordingfileformat: Still Image: JPEG(DCF, Exif 2.3), RAW, / MPO (When attaching 3D lens in Micro Four Thirds standard) / Motion Image: AVCHD (Audio format: Dolby Digital 2 ch) / MP4 (Audio format AAC 2ch)
software: PHOTOfunSTUDIO 7.0 HD Edition / SILKYPIX Developer Studio 3.1 SE / LoiLoScope (trial version) / USB Driver
